=Use the Parser Alone=

Besides using this library with GUI, you can use only the parser without GUI. The class [http://java-prettify.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/prettify/PrettifyParser.html prettify.parser.Prettify] has implemented the [http://java-prettify.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/syntaxhighlight/Parser.html Parser] interface. You can initiate the class and then invoke the [http://java-prettify.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/syntaxhighlight/Parser.html#parse%28java.lang.String,%20java.lang.String%29 Parser#parse(String, String)] to parse the content. See also the [http://java-prettify.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/syntaxhighlight/ParseResult.html ParseResult] to know how to use the parsed results.

For more details, you can have a look to [http://java-prettify.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/prettify/parser/Prettify.html prettify.parser.Prettify#parse(...)].
